interval_helper: Set the weather data refresh interval in minutes. Make sure not to exhaust the daily API quota.
m_descr:
Fetches detailed weather data from www.forecast.io. Creates up to six virtual devices for humidity, wind, pressure, current conditions and (high/low/condition) forecasts.
Check github.com/maros/Zway-ForecastIO for detailed documentation.
error_fetch: Could not load weather data from forecast.io.
